name: org.openrewrite.quarkus.spring.AddQuarkusMavenPlugin
displayName: Add Quarkus Maven plugin
description: Adds the Quarkus Maven plugin using the same version as the quarkus-bom in dependency management.
category1Description: Recipes to rewrite Spring to Quarkus.

name: org.openrewrite.quarkus.spring.JpaEntityToPanacheEntity
displayName: Convert JPA Entity to Panache Entity
description: Transforms standard JPA entities to extend Quarkus PanacheEntity, enabling the Active Record pattern with built-in CRUD operations.
category1Description: Recipes to rewrite Spring to Quarkus.

name: org.openrewrite.quarkus.spring.RemoveSpringBootParent
displayName: Remove Spring Boot 3.x parent POM
description: Removes the Spring Boot 3.x starter parent POM from Maven projects.
category1Description: Recipes to rewrite Spring to Quarkus.

name: org.openrewrite.quarkus.spring.ResponseEntityToJaxRsResponse
displayName: Convert Spring `ResponseEntity` to JAX-RS `Response`
description: Transforms Spring `ResponseEntity` patterns to JAX-RS `Response` API equivalents.
category1Description: Recipes to rewrite Spring to Quarkus.

name: org.openrewrite.quarkus.spring.SpringApplicationRunToQuarkusRun
displayName: Replace `SpringApplication.run()` with `Quarkus.run()`
description: Replace Spring Boot's `SpringApplication.run()` method calls with Quarkus's `Quarkus.run()`.
category1Description: Recipes to rewrite Spring to Quarkus.

name: org.openrewrite.quarkus.spring.SpringBeanToCdiProduces
displayName: Replace Spring `@Bean` with CDI `@Produces`
description: Transform Spring `@Bean` methods to CDI `@Produces` methods with appropriate scope annotations.
category1Description: Recipes to rewrite Spring to Quarkus.

name: org.openrewrite.quarkus.spring.SpringEventListenerToObserves
displayName: Convert Spring @EventListener to CDI @Observes
description: Transforms Spring's @EventListener method annotation to CDI's @Observes parameter annotation pattern.
category1Description: Recipes to rewrite Spring to Quarkus.

name: org.openrewrite.quarkus.spring.SpringHealthIndicatorToQuarkus
displayName: Convert Spring HealthIndicator to Quarkus HealthCheck
description: Transforms Spring Boot Actuator `HealthIndicator` implementations to MicroProfile Health `HealthCheck` pattern used by Quarkus.
category1Description: Recipes to rewrite Spring to Quarkus.

name: org.openrewrite.quarkus.spring.ValueToCdiConfigProperty
displayName: Replace Spring `@Value` with CDI `@ConfigProperty`
description: Transform Spring `@Value` annotations to MicroProfile `@ConfigProperty` with proper parameter mapping.
category1Description: Recipes to rewrite Spring to Quarkus.

name: org.openrewrite.quarkus.spring.WebToJaxRs
displayName: Convert Spring Web annotations to JAX-RS
description: Converts Spring Web annotations such as `@RestController`, `@RequestMapping`, `@GetMapping`, etc., to their JAX-RS equivalents like `@Path`, `@GET`, etc.
category1Description: Recipes to rewrite Spring to Quarkus.

name: org.openrewrite.quarkus.spring.AddSpringCompatibilityExtensions
displayName: Add Spring compatibility extensions for commonly used annotations
description: Adds Quarkus Spring compatibility extensions when Spring annotations are detected in the codebase.
category1Description: Recipes to rewrite Spring to Quarkus.

name: org.openrewrite.quarkus.spring.EnableAnnotationsToQuarkusDependencies
displayName: Migrate `@EnableXyz` annotations to Quarkus extensions
description: Removes Spring `@EnableXyz` annotations and adds the corresponding Quarkus extensions as dependencies.
category1Description: Recipes to rewrite Spring to Quarkus.

name: org.openrewrite.quarkus.spring.MigrateBootStarters
displayName: Replace Spring Boot starter dependencies with Quarkus equivalents
description: Migrates Spring Boot starter dependencies to their Quarkus equivalents, removing version tags as Quarkus manages versions through its BOM.
category1Description: Recipes to rewrite Spring to Quarkus.

name: org.openrewrite.quarkus.spring.SpringBootWebToQuarkusReactive
displayName: Replace Spring Boot Web with Quarkus REST
description: Migrates `spring-boot-starter-web` to `quarkus-rest-jackson` when reactor dependencies are present.
category1Description: Recipes to rewrite Spring to Quarkus.

name: org.openrewrite.quarkus.spring.SpringBootWebToQuarkusClassic
displayName: Replace Spring Boot Web with Quarkus RESTEasy Classic
description: Migrates `spring-boot-starter-web` to `quarkus-resteasy-jackson` when no reactor dependencies are present.
category1Description: Recipes to rewrite Spring to Quarkus.

name: org.openrewrite.quarkus.spring.SpringBootDataJpaToQuarkus
displayName: Replace Spring Boot Data JPA with Quarkus Hibernate ORM Panache
description: Migrates `spring-boot-starter-data-jpa` to `quarkus-hibernate-orm-panache`.
category1Description: Recipes to rewrite Spring to Quarkus.

name: org.openrewrite.quarkus.spring.SpringBootSecurityToQuarkus
displayName: Replace Spring Boot Security with Quarkus Security
description: Migrates `spring-boot-starter-security` to `quarkus-security`.
category1Description: Recipes to rewrite Spring to Quarkus.

name: org.openrewrite.quarkus.spring.SpringBootValidationToQuarkus
displayName: Replace Spring Boot Validation with Quarkus Hibernate Validator
description: Migrates `spring-boot-starter-validation` to `quarkus-hibernate-validator`.
category1Description: Recipes to rewrite Spring to Quarkus.

name: org.openrewrite.quarkus.spring.SpringBootTestToQuarkus
displayName: Replace Spring Boot Test with Quarkus JUnit 5
description: Migrates `spring-boot-starter-test` to `quarkus-junit5`.
category1Description: Recipes to rewrite Spring to Quarkus.

name: org.openrewrite.quarkus.spring.SpringBootActuatorToQuarkus
displayName: Replace Spring Boot Actuator with Quarkus SmallRye Health
description: Migrates `spring-boot-starter-actuator` to `quarkus-smallrye-health`.
category1Description: Recipes to rewrite Spring to Quarkus.

name: org.openrewrite.quarkus.spring.SpringBootWebSocketToQuarkus
displayName: Replace Spring Boot WebSocket with Quarkus WebSockets
description: Migrates `spring-boot-starter-websocket` to `quarkus-websockets`.
category1Description: Recipes to rewrite Spring to Quarkus.

name: org.openrewrite.quarkus.spring.SpringBootCacheToQuarkus
displayName: Replace Spring Boot Cache with Quarkus Cache
description: Migrates `spring-boot-starter-cache` to `quarkus-cache`.
category1Description: Recipes to rewrite Spring to Quarkus.

name: org.openrewrite.quarkus.spring.SpringBootWebFluxToQuarkusReactive
displayName: Replace Spring Boot WebFlux with Quarkus REST Client
description: Migrates `spring-boot-starter-webflux` to `quarkus-rest-client-jackson` when reactor dependencies are present.
category1Description: Recipes to rewrite Spring to Quarkus.

name: org.openrewrite.quarkus.spring.SpringBootDataMongoToQuarkus
displayName: Replace Spring Boot Data MongoDB with Quarkus MongoDB Panache
description: Migrates `spring-boot-starter-data-mongodb` to `quarkus-mongodb-panache`.
category1Description: Recipes to rewrite Spring to Quarkus.

name: org.openrewrite.quarkus.spring.SpringBootDataRedisToQuarkus
displayName: Replace Spring Boot Data Redis with Quarkus Redis Client
description: Migrates `spring-boot-starter-data-redis` to `quarkus-redis-client`.
category1Description: Recipes to rewrite Spring to Quarkus.

name: org.openrewrite.quarkus.spring.SpringBootAmqpToQuarkusReactive
displayName: Replace Spring Boot AMQP with Quarkus Messaging AMQP
description: Migrates `spring-boot-starter-amqp` to `quarkus-messaging-amqp` when reactor dependencies are present.
category1Description: Recipes to rewrite Spring to Quarkus.

name: org.openrewrite.quarkus.spring.SpringBootAmqpToQuarkusClassic
displayName: Replace Spring Boot AMQP with Quarkus Messaging RabbitMQ
description: Migrates `spring-boot-starter-amqp` to `quarkus-messaging-rabbitmq` when no reactor dependencies are present.
category1Description: Recipes to rewrite Spring to Quarkus.

name: org.openrewrite.quarkus.spring.SpringKafkaToQuarkusReactive
displayName: Replace Spring Kafka with Quarkus Messaging Kafka
description: Migrates `spring-kafka` to `quarkus-messaging-kafka` when reactor dependencies are present.
category1Description: Recipes to rewrite Spring to Quarkus.

name: org.openrewrite.quarkus.spring.SpringKafkaToQuarkusClassic
displayName: Replace Spring Kafka with Quarkus Kafka Client
description: Migrates `spring-kafka` to `quarkus-kafka-client` when no reactor dependencies are present.
category1Description: Recipes to rewrite Spring to Quarkus.

name: org.openrewrite.quarkus.spring.SpringBootOAuth2ResourceServerToQuarkus
displayName: Replace Spring Boot OAuth2 Resource Server with Quarkus OIDC
description: Migrates `spring-boot-starter-oauth2-resource-server` to `quarkus-oidc`.
category1Description: Recipes to rewrite Spring to Quarkus.

name: org.openrewrite.quarkus.spring.SpringBootOAuth2ClientToQuarkus
displayName: Replace Spring Boot OAuth2 Client with Quarkus OIDC Client
description: Migrates spring-boot-starter-oauth2-client` to `quarkus-oidc-client`.
category1Description: Recipes to rewrite Spring to Quarkus.

name: org.openrewrite.quarkus.spring.SpringBootJdbcToQuarkus
displayName: Replace Spring Boot JDBC with Quarkus Agroal
description: Migrates `spring-boot-starter-jdbc` to `quarkus-agroal`.
category1Description: Recipes to rewrite Spring to Quarkus.

name: org.openrewrite.quarkus.spring.SpringBootMailToQuarkus
displayName: Replace Spring Boot Mail with Quarkus Mailer
description: Migrates `spring-boot-starter-mail` to `quarkus-mailer`.
category1Description: Recipes to rewrite Spring to Quarkus.

name: org.openrewrite.quarkus.spring.SpringBootBatchToQuarkus
displayName: Replace Spring Boot Batch with Quarkus Scheduler
description: Migrates `spring-boot-starter-batch` to `quarkus-scheduler`.
category1Description: Recipes to rewrite Spring to Quarkus.

name: org.openrewrite.quarkus.spring.SpringBootThymeleafToQuarkus
displayName: Replace Spring Boot Thymeleaf with Quarkus Qute
description: Migrates `spring-boot-starter-thymeleaf` to `quarkus-qute`.
category1Description: Recipes to rewrite Spring to Quarkus.

name: org.openrewrite.quarkus.spring.SpringBootQuartzToQuarkus
displayName: Replace Spring Boot Quartz with Quarkus Quartz
description: Migrates `spring-boot-starter-quartz` to `quarkus-quartz`.
category1Description: Recipes to rewrite Spring to Quarkus.

name: org.openrewrite.quarkus.spring.SpringBootIntegrationToQuarkus
displayName: Replace Spring Boot Integration with Camel Quarkus
description: Migrates `spring-boot-starter-integration` to `camel-quarkus-core`.
category1Description: Recipes to rewrite Spring to Quarkus.

name: org.openrewrite.quarkus.spring.SpringBootActiveMQToQuarkus
displayName: Replace Spring Boot ActiveMQ with Quarkus Artemis JMS
description: Migrates `spring-boot-starter-activemq` to `quarkus-artemis-jms`.
category1Description: Recipes to rewrite Spring to Quarkus.

name: org.openrewrite.quarkus.spring.SpringBootArtemisToQuarkus
displayName: Replace Spring Boot Artemis with Quarkus Artemis JMS
description: Migrates `spring-boot-starter-artemis` to `quarkus-artemis-jms`.
category1Description: Recipes to rewrite Spring to Quarkus.

name: org.openrewrite.quarkus.spring.SpringBootElasticsearchToQuarkus
displayName: Replace Spring Boot Elasticsearch with Quarkus Elasticsearch REST Client
description: Migrates `spring-boot-starter-data-elasticsearch` to `quarkus-elasticsearch-rest-client`.
category1Description: Recipes to rewrite Spring to Quarkus.

name: org.openrewrite.quarkus.spring.SpringBootDataRestToQuarkus
displayName: Replace Spring Boot Data REST with Quarkus REST
description: Migrates `spring-boot-starter-data-rest` to `quarkus-rest-jackson`.
category1Description: Recipes to rewrite Spring to Quarkus.

name: org.openrewrite.quarkus.spring.MigrateDatabaseDrivers
displayName: Migrate database drivers to Quarkus JDBC extensions
description: Replaces Spring Boot database driver dependencies with their Quarkus JDBC extension equivalents.
category1Description: Recipes to rewrite Spring to Quarkus.

name: org.openrewrite.quarkus.spring.H2DriverToQuarkus
displayName: Replace H2 driver with Quarkus JDBC H2
description: Migrates `com.h2database:h2` to `io.quarkus:quarkus-jdbc-h2` (excludes test scope).
category1Description: Recipes to rewrite Spring to Quarkus.

name: org.openrewrite.quarkus.spring.H2TestDriverToQuarkus
displayName: Replace H2 test driver with Quarkus JDBC H2 (test scope)
description: Migrates `com.h2database:h2` with test scope to `io.quarkus:quarkus-jdbc-h2` with test scope.
category1Description: Recipes to rewrite Spring to Quarkus.

name: org.openrewrite.quarkus.spring.DerbyDriverToQuarkus
displayName: Replace Derby driver with Quarkus JDBC Derby
description: Migrates `org.apache.derby:derby` or `derbyclient` to `io.quarkus:quarkus-jdbc-derby` (excludes test scope).
category1Description: Recipes to rewrite Spring to Quarkus.

name: org.openrewrite.quarkus.spring.DerbyTestDriverToQuarkus
displayName: Replace Derby test driver with Quarkus JDBC Derby (test scope)
description: Migrates `org.apache.derby:derby` with test scope to `io.quarkus:quarkus-jdbc-derby` with test scope.
category1Description: Recipes to rewrite Spring to Quarkus.

name: org.openrewrite.quarkus.spring.SpringBootToQuarkus
displayName: Migrate Spring Boot to Quarkus
description: Replace Spring Boot with Quarkus.
category1Description: Recipes to rewrite Spring to Quarkus.

name: org.openrewrite.quarkus.spring.MigrateMavenPlugin
displayName: Add or replace Spring Boot build plugin with Quarkus build plugin
description: Remove Spring Boot Maven plugin if present and add Quarkus Maven plugin using the same version as the quarkus-bom.
category1Description: Recipes to rewrite Spring to Quarkus.

name: org.openrewrite.quarkus.spring.ReplaceSpringBootApplication
displayName: Replace `@SpringBootApplication` with Quarkus equivalent
description: Replace `@SpringBootApplication` annotation with `@QuarkusMain`, `SpringApplication.run()` calls.
category1Description: Recipes to rewrite Spring to Quarkus.

name: org.openrewrite.quarkus.spring.StereotypeAnnotationsToCDI
displayName: Migrate Spring annotations to CDI
description: Replace Spring stereotype and injection annotations with CDI equivalents.
category1Description: Recipes to rewrite Spring to Quarkus.

name: org.openrewrite.quarkus.spring.MigrateSpringValidation
displayName: Migrate Spring Validation to Quarkus
description: Migrates Spring Boot validation to Quarkus Hibernate Validator. Adds the quarkus-hibernate-validator dependency and handles validation annotation imports.
category1Description: Recipes to rewrite Spring to Quarkus.

name: org.openrewrite.quarkus.spring.MigrateSpringActuator
displayName: Migrate Spring Boot Actuator to Quarkus Health and Metrics
description: Migrates Spring Boot Actuator to Quarkus SmallRye Health and Metrics extensions. Converts HealthIndicator implementations to Quarkus HealthCheck pattern.
category1Description: Recipes to rewrite Spring to Quarkus.

name: org.openrewrite.quarkus.spring.MigrateSpringTesting
displayName: Migrate Spring Boot Testing to Quarkus Testing
description: Migrates Spring Boot test annotations and utilities to Quarkus test equivalents. Converts @SpringBootTest to @QuarkusTest, @MockBean to @InjectMock, etc.
category1Description: Recipes to rewrite Spring to Quarkus.

name: org.openrewrite.quarkus.spring.MigrateConfigurationProperties
displayName: Migrate @ConfigurationProperties to Quarkus @ConfigMapping
description: Migrates Spring Boot @ConfigurationProperties to Quarkus @ConfigMapping. This recipe converts configuration property classes to the native Quarkus pattern.
category1Description: Recipes to rewrite Spring to Quarkus.

name: org.openrewrite.quarkus.spring.MigrateSpringTransactional
displayName: Migrate Spring @Transactional to Jakarta @Transactional
description: Migrates Spring's @Transactional annotation to Jakarta's @Transactional. Maps propagation attributes to TxType and removes Spring-specific attributes.
category1Description: Recipes to rewrite Spring to Quarkus.

name: org.openrewrite.quarkus.spring.MigrateSpringEvents
displayName: Migrate Spring Events to CDI Events
description: Migrates Spring's event mechanism to CDI events. Converts ApplicationEventPublisher to CDI Event and @EventListener to @Observes.
category1Description: Recipes to rewrite Spring to Quarkus.

name: org.openrewrite.quarkus.spring.MigrateEntitiesToPanache
displayName: Migrate JPA Entities to Panache Entities
description: Converts standard JPA entities to Quarkus Panache entities using the Active Record pattern. Entities will extend PanacheEntity and gain built-in CRUD operations.
category1Description: Recipes to rewrite Spring to Quarkus.

name: org.openrewrite.quarkus.spring.MigrateSpringDataMongodb
displayName: Migrate Spring Data MongoDB to Quarkus Panache MongoDB
description: Migrates Spring Data MongoDB repositories to Quarkus MongoDB with Panache. Converts MongoRepository interfaces to PanacheMongoRepository pattern.
category1Description: Recipes to rewrite Spring to Quarkus.

name: org.openrewrite.quarkus.spring.MigrateSpringCloudConfig
displayName: Migrate Spring Cloud Config Client to Quarkus Config
description: Migrates Spring Cloud Config Client to Quarkus configuration sources. Converts bootstrap.yml/properties patterns to Quarkus config.
category1Description: Recipes to rewrite Spring to Quarkus.

name: org.openrewrite.quarkus.spring.ConfigureNativeBuild
displayName: Configure Quarkus Native Build Support
description: Adds configuration and dependencies required for Quarkus native image compilation with GraalVM. Includes native profile configuration and reflection hints where needed.
category1Description: Recipes to rewrite Spring to Quarkus.

name: org.openrewrite.quarkus.spring.MigrateSpringAop
displayName: Migrate Spring AOP to CDI Interceptors
description: Migrates Spring AOP aspects to CDI interceptors. Converts @Aspect classes to CDI interceptors with @Interceptor and @AroundInvoke patterns.
category1Description: Recipes to rewrite Spring to Quarkus.

name: org.openrewrite.quarkus.spring.MigrateRequestParameterEdgeCases
displayName: Migrate Additional Spring Web Parameter Annotations
description: Migrates additional Spring Web parameter annotations not covered by the main WebToJaxRs recipe. Includes @MatrixVariable, @CookieValue, and other edge cases.
category1Description: Recipes to rewrite Spring to Quarkus.

name: org.openrewrite.quarkus.spring.MigrateSpringCloudServiceDiscovery
displayName: Migrate Spring Cloud Service Discovery to Quarkus
description: Migrates Spring Cloud Service Discovery annotations and configurations to Quarkus equivalents. Converts @EnableDiscoveryClient and related patterns to Quarkus Stork service discovery.
category1Description: Recipes to rewrite Spring to Quarkus.

name: org.openrewrite.quarkus.spring.MigrateSpringBootDevTools
displayName: Remove Spring Boot DevTools
description: Removes Spring Boot DevTools dependency and configuration. Quarkus has built-in dev mode with hot reload that replaces DevTools functionality.
category1Description: Recipes to rewrite Spring to Quarkus.

name: org.openrewrite.quarkus.spring.CustomizeQuarkusVersion
displayName: Customize Quarkus BOM Version
description: Allows customization of the Quarkus BOM version used in the migration. By default uses 3.x (latest 3.x version), but can be configured to use a specific version.
category1Description: Recipes to rewrite Spring to Quarkus.

name: org.openrewrite.quarkus.spring.CustomizeQuarkusPluginGoals
displayName: Customize Quarkus Maven Plugin Goals
description: Allows customization of Quarkus Maven plugin goals. Adds or modifies the executions and goals for the quarkus-maven-plugin.
category1Description: Recipes to rewrite Spring to Quarkus.
